titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 36) establishing a select committee to investigate and report on the attack on the United States consulate in Benghazi, Libya.
Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 36) establishing a select committee to investigate and report on the attack on the United States consulate in Benghazi, Libya.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Stockman. Petition No: 113-4.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 36 (establishes a select committee to investigate and report on the attack on the U.S. consulate in Benghazi, Libya).
